import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import "./style.css"; import Select from 'react-select'; import {ContextConsumer} from '../../utils/Context' import {constants} from '../../constants/values' const AddressElement = () => { const contextValues = useContext(ContextConsumer); // history.push("/address"); if( contextValues.user_address[0] ) { console.log("user : " , contextValues.user_address[0].full_name ) if(contextValues.user_address[0].full_name==="name") { } } console.log("uservalues : ", contextValues.user_address ) const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ full_name: "", house_name: "", pincode: "", street_name: "", district : "1", block:"" }); const handleChange = (event) => { const name = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setInputs(values => ({...values, [name]: value})) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); alert(inputs); } return (

Enter your Address

<> { inputs.district==="1"? <> : inputs.district==="2"? <> : inputs.district==="3"? <> : <> }

Delivery Time Slot

{/* */}

Total Price : 1000/-

) } export default AddressElement;
